hero.name: Aayush Kumar
hero.tagline: Data science student building APIs and web applications

about.summary: Data Science and Statistics undergraduate at UCSB with experience building REST APIs, web apps, and data workflows. Comfortable across Python/TypeScript stacks, with interests in quantitative systems and product reliability.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
bullets: Developed REST APIs in Express.js/Node.js/MySQL powering mobile and web clients.
Streamlined founder–developer communication to accelerate feature delivery.
Executed end-to-end test passes to catch regressions and UX issues early.

experience.title: Web Developer
bullets: Built a company website with TypeScript, Firebase, and AWS hosting.
Implemented a daily Cron job to fetch data and render performance charts.
Proposed UI improvements and visual design options to stakeholders.

experience.title: QA Tester
bullets: Ran stress tests and identified 15+ critical bugs, improving reliability.
Coordinated with engineers and PMs to speed up fixes and releases.

education.degree: B.S. in Data Science and Statistics
bullets: Coursework: Data Structures and Algorithms, R, SAS, Linear Regressions, Statistics, Machine Learning
Activities: Data Science Club, Intramural Soccer, Intramural Basketball
APs: Calculus BC, Computer Science A, Statistics, Physics C
Leadership: Academic Decathlon President; AP Calculus & AP Physics Tutor

certifications.name: SAS Certified Specialist: Base Programming Using SAS 9.4
